name: Hacker Survivors TD Turbo Deluxe Special Edition

description:
Made for love jam 2023

web version is laggy download teh game if you can

Game instructions are on the man page v7.0

Tips:

Flame, shock, explosive and rocket towers wont shoot by themselves, you need to connect it to an ammo tower, and then to a tower that shoots 

The shield tower also needs ammo and applys bullet effects

Pause the game with space to think and connect your towers properly

the game doesnt work correctly with non 16:9 resolutions

(i accidentaly deleted the windows zip file, i uploaded it again but I didnt update the game I swear!!)
